post.summary:
It will validate followings
1. Vault capacity
2. VM is already protected
3. Any VM related configuration passed in properties.

requestBody.description: Enable backup validation request on Virtual Machine

post.summary: It will validate if given feature with resource properties is supported in service

get.description:
Provides the details of the protection intent up item. This is an asynchronous operation. To know the status of the operation,
call the GetItemOperationResult API.

parameters.name: vaultName
parameters.description: The name of the recovery services vault.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group where the recovery services vault is present.

parameters.name: fabricName
parameters.description: Fabric name associated with the backed up item.

parameters.name: intentObjectName
parameters.description: Backed up item name whose details are to be fetched.

put.description: Create Intent for Enabling backup of an item. This is a synchronous operation.

parameters.name: vaultName
parameters.description: The name of the recovery services vault.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group where the recovery services vault is present.

parameters.name: fabricName
parameters.description: Fabric name associated with the backup item.

parameters.name: vaultName
parameters.description: The name of the recovery services vault.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group where the recovery services vault is present.

parameters.name: fabricName
parameters.description: Fabric name associated with the intent.

parameters.name: vaultName

PreValidateEnableBackupRequest.description:
Contract to validate if backup can be enabled on the given resource in a given vault and given configuration.
It will validate followings
1. Vault capacity
2. VM is already protected
3. Any VM related configuration passed in properties.

containerName.description:
Specifies the product specific container name. E.g. iaasvmcontainer;iaasvmcontainer;rgname;vmname. This is required
for portal

protectedItemName.description: Specifies the product specific ds name. E.g. vm;iaasvmcontainer;rgname;vmname. This is required for portal

PreValidateEnableBackupResponse.description: Response contract for enable backup validation request

backupManagementType.description: Type of backup management for the backed up item.

itemId.description: ID of the item which is getting protected, In case of Azure Vm , it is ProtectedItemId

policyId.description: ID of the backup policy with which this item is backed up.

protectionState.description: Backup state of this backup item.

sourceResourceId.description: ARM ID of the resource to be backed up.

backupManagementType.description: Backup management type for the backed up item

itemType.description: Type of workload this item represents

id.description: Resource Id represents the complete path to the resource.

name.description: Resource name associated with the resource.

type.description: Resource type represents the complete path of the form Namespace/ResourceType/ResourceType/...

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of resources. Call ListNext() fetches next page of resources.

ResourceList.description: Base for all lists of resources.
